label: Multimedia codecs
description: Utilized by multimedia applications to encode or decode audio or video streams.

exec.label: Install
exec.command: run-as-root pacman -S --noconfirm gstreamer gst-plugins-bad gst-plugins-base  gst-plugins-base-libs gst-plugins-good gst-plugins-ugly xine-lib libdvdcss libdvdread dvd+rw-tools vlc lame

undo.label: Remove
undo.command: run-as-root pacman -Rdd --noconfirm gstreamer gst-plugins-bad gst-plugins-base  gst-plugins-base-libs gst-plugins-good gst-plugins-ugly xine-lib libdvdcss libdvdread dvd+rw-tools vlc lame
